Reviews.Title: Better than expected.
Reviews.Author: Bubba
Reviews.Content: Easy install.  I assisted an 83 year young man to install it over phone.  He had never used a BNC connector.  Works better than expected. I have two 8 channel box dvrs that have less recording/alarming features.  Documentation lacking.  Should add you tube links, excellent videos out there.

ProductInfo.Features:
4 Channel Super USB DVR Video & Audio Real-time Network CCTV Capture Card 120FPS
Features 4-channel video input and 4-channel audio input in one card, allows you to watch 4 different video displays on one screen
Compatible with Windows 2000 / XP / Vista /7 (32 &64Bit)
4 channel video input on one card. Maximum display/recording rate is 25 fps in PAL format; 30 fps in NTSC(US) format per channel
Record resolution: D1(PAL: 704 x 576  NTSC 720 x 480)
ProductInfo.Name: 4CH Super USB DVR Video & Audio D1 Real-time Capture Card Windows 7 64 Bits
